nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: Busy as always. Let’s roll the chocolate chips.

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: I eat excessive amounts of sugar to cope with the fact that my wife left me and took the kids because of my gambling addiction. So as I was saying, I would like to place a bet...

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: One of them desserts smells a bit fishy, don't you think? You wouldn’t happen to hear something ‘bout this?

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: I do not know how true this is but there has been gossip about {fighterB}. They say there is something fishy about him but that is all I know.
